segments.text: Hi . I ’ m here to catch flight 513 to New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see your ticket please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . Do you need to see my passport ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Any form of picture I . D . will do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mmmm ... a photo I . D . I have my New Jersey driver ’ s license . Is that ok ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will do . What an interesting picture ! How old is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually it wad taken just last year , but I had a shaved head and a beard . Can you still recognize me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Barely . Will you be checking any luggage today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , One suitcase . I also have a carry-on bag .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Mr . Lee , you ’ re all set . Your flight leaves from gate 10 . Boarding begins at 10:30
segments.speaker: S2
